author: Saleh Ilyas P
title: Lovely stay, comfortable everything was great. Room was very spacious and clean. Down side had to go across the road for
text:
A very comfortable stay. Rooms were spacious and clean. Very good for families.
Staff were very helpful and caring.
Down side for breakfast we had to cross the road to the main building and breakfast was very basic could do with more variety
